title: Friendsgiving
description:
Our story tonight is called Friendsgiving and it’s a story about a meal shared on mismatched dishes across an old table. It’s also about a gate connecting two yards, the way crabapple trees grow, and making new traditions when things change.

So get cozy and ready to sleep.

Buy the book:http://hyperurl.co/NothingMuchHappens

Get an autographed copy here: https://www.nothingmuchhappens.com/nmh-stuff (US only)

This episode mentions alcohol.

Get our ad-free and bonus episodes here: https://nothingmuchhappens.supportingcast.fm

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
